html:
12.12.19  3:01 am   what inspired you to make "Mt. Saint Helens is about to blow up"?

     it was right there. (here ...... and then here) couldn't seem to get away from it

12.12.19  3:00 am   i was just in my apartment and i thought i was wearing a hat so i went to grab the front of the cap but i wasnt wearing a hat and then everyone in a 100 mile radius started laughing at me and then i fell to the floor and started crying and the laughter just grew louder and more roaring. How do i recover from this humiliating experience?

     performances like that are priceless. (i'm talking about the missed hat). some movie makers search for centuries for genuine oddities like that. put it on the screen, that's what i say

12.12.19  1:59 am   how does one ask good questions?

     impossible. it can't be done

12.12.19  1:47 am   favorite moment from the soundtrack to any musical?!

     most of "cheer up charlie"

12.12.19  1:06 am   Bill, I am a college student majoring in history. I love history, however I had a terrible experience this semester writing my paper. I believe I already have anxiety, but I've never seen anyone about it. Writing my paper for history brought me an incredible amount of stress and self-hatred because I knew it wasn't of quality. The rest of the class was enjoyable and the exams were easy, but I didn't really take anything away from it besides the stress.  I love history, but what I really want to do is to is to write… fiction… movies. I do want to write about history, mostly about the history of American folk music, but I don't know if I want history to be more of a hobby than a career. I also took a required Drama class and just got 100%con my final. I enjoyed it so much. We talked about and examined theatre plays and I loved it so much more than my history class. How do I know what I should do?

     it sounds pretty clear that you should do the drama

      Should I change my major?

     i don't actually know what that means

      I haven't done any n on-schoo l related writing in months. I don't want to get a masters in history and realize I've wasted years of my life. How do I figure all this out? 

     it seems pretty much figured out, from the way you told the story

12.12.19  1:03 am   this questions page is a great source of inspiration for me because i am always trying to figure out how to get stronger and that seems to be a running theme i see in here along with several other themes, thanks for all the funny and out of the box answers cause they fill my spirit with glee. hopefully one day i can be super duper strong but there's really no limit which is what i'm trying to figure out. is life just one of those games at the carnival where we see who can smash the target thing with the hammer the hardest? (upon googling it's called the High Striker)

     no, it's make your own game day. it's the game making game

12.12.19  12:58 am   all the negativity people vent at you, what happens to it where does it go?

     into a contraption of mirrors, where it continues to bounce back and forth between negative and positive

12.12.19  12:08 am   What is your opinion on the licc

     it's good

12.12.19  12:04 am   Hi Bill, did you study music or are you self taught?

     both. i studied it by myself

12.12.19  12:01 am   what do you think about this new fangled things called shoes

     i am waiting for the unfangled version

12.11.19  11:33 pm   can you sort the following punctuation marks into good ones and bad ones please

/&@($^":?<.[{\';|=_%!~

thanks

     done. they are all good

12.11.19  11:11 pm   Thank you for your wisdom Bill
You know the 'bling-bling-bling-bling-bling dit-dit zwoop' part in Long Long Long Journey?

     actually no, but that's because i haven't heard it since i released it

      It makes me feel like a little bell, what does it make you feel like? 

     i'm guessing that's probably something instrumental, otherwise you probably would have said the lyric

12.11.19  10:55 pm   how would you feel about using slap bass in a song

     maybe for only 1 note

12.11.19  10:28 pm   will we get a virtual reality experience from you?

     that seems probable

      i am getting a headset and i would love to be fully surrounded in all 360 degrees with wurtzyness. i will settle for a 360 image

     actually i would be prefer the opposite. i'm not entirely interested in the '360 image', i am much more interested in 3D stereoscopy, and/or world building

12.11.19  10:26 pm   what is the best letter

     0

12.11.19  10:26 pm   Whats your favorite word?

     horsey

12.11.19  9:40 pm   these are so so fun to read and thanks for putting time into your day to answer all of these :)

     thanks for your sudden outburst of friendliness

12.11.19  9:24 pm   how do u motivate urself to do anything bill wurtz. i hate unloading my laundry 

     then try leaving them in there. that might be what you really want

12.11.19  9:06 pm   apparently im the same way where i can only get stuff done where i pretend im making a movie, so i guess it's time to fill my hard drive with clips of me doing dishes and stuff. this movie is gonna be epic

     it's all in the editing. you can trust me on that one

12.11.19  8:58 pm   besides brushing teeth, what is surprisingly a good shaker sound?

     rubbing your jeans. i used that in the last verse of airport terminal

12.11.19  8:32 pm   What is music to you?

     it's pretty good

12.11.19  8:32 pm   i think i realize my error ive been wishing on planets instead of stars and its just too powerful how can i fix it

     wish on some small asteroids or space trash, to compensate

12.11.19  7:59 pm   help everything's upside down and i can't find my shoes

     ok i will look for them

12.11.19  7:58 pm   What is your opinion on the statement that birds control time purely out of spite?

     i sense a slight bit of anger, in the statement

12.11.19  7:26 pm   What is something easy that nobody has ever done?

     save the darn world

12.11.19  7:20 pm   if you could put any other artist's song into the same genre as your songs, what would it be?

     "calypso" by john denver

12.11.19  7:17 pm   i got a bent hat, can you help me slow down?

     i think you are already going at the right pace

12.11.19  7:04 pm   Why does it pop up with "not even close" when I ask a question

     that was obviously the answer to your question

12.11.19  6:50 pm   hello bill i would like to learn how to fuck an elevator, would you be interested in making an educational video on this?

     yes

12.11.19  6:43 pm   Who in the music industry influences you? (Or just like who's your favorite musician)

     i can't say. everyone is better than each other

12.11.19  6:42 pm   billy wurtz, sir, can i be a special person?

     ok

12.11.19  6:37 pm   how do you fall over? im having trouble doing it

     impossible. it can't be done

12.11.19  6:26 pm   Who are some of your favorite music artists?

     i can't say. everyone is better than each other

12.11.19  6:26 pm   thank you for making amazing videos for people to watch!

     thank you for your sudden outburst of friendliness

12.11.19  6:25 pm   How would you describe yourself?

     i would probably make a website

12.11.19  6:17 pm   I forgot what i wanted to ask, sorry.

     that's ok

12.11.19  5:51 pm   Lemons or limes.which is better

     they keep getting worse than each other

12.11.19  5:25 pm   I've been reading this question section for ages, and with the exception of questions you answer multiple times, I can never predict what you are going to say. Is this because I am not you?

     no, i can't predict either

12.11.19  5:11 pm   how did the dow jones fall down to zero

     due to the magic of songwriting

12.11.19  4:47 pm   help i don't know what question to ask

     just copy someone else's question

12.11.19  4:36 pm   how ethical is it for individual creators to design something addicting? how ethical is it for multinational corporations to do the same?

     extremely. which is great news if you're like me and are addicted to ethics

12.11.19  4:19 pm   how do you get an existing license? 

     you have to make your own

     what the heck is a mall

12.11.19  3:45 pm   Can you defend your hypothesis that fruit and bread is 'probably not' love?

     it actually is, but first you need to show the context that was taken from

     someone may have expected the wrong thing

     space cheese

what do you think

12.11.19  2:42 pm   Hi, I'm learning to play piano and after almost 3 years of trying to figure it out, I still can't read sheet music. Do you have any tips? (they don't have to be particularly helpful, as long as it's a tip, it works)

     need more info: you said you are learning to play piano, and after 3 years you can't read sheet music. but the piece of information i am missing is did you learn how to play piano

12.11.19  2:31 pm   what is the f word

     fword

12.11.19  2:13 pm   If bread is toasted is toast breaded?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes
